item.description:
Yo everyone, sign up. We will climb Metro Rock or Boston Rock Gym Tuesdays. Let's have fun.
Let's do Metro rock first - look up their web site for details. You will need to be belay tested before climbing if you are new to the gym. You can also take a class if you need to. Give them a call:

Everett / Boston
69 Norman Street
Everett, MA 02149
617?387?ROCK (7625)

They have a shuttle to the gym if you don't have a car.
item.name: Rock Climbing Boston April Meetup
